channel.title: developments on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in developments on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: materials and info
item.description: I am a statistician and my research is focused on the methodological and computational aspects of data analysis. The best feeling is when I can use my knowledge to solve practical and real problems. I am currently working on latent variable models, unsupervised classification and model-based composite indicators. ongoing projects seminars and talks events teaching material

item.title: ongoing projects
item.description: my current researches are: Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G. Gaussian mixture model with an extended ultrametric covariance structure the maximum likelihood estimation of a Gaussian Mixture Model where the covariance structure is modeled according to an extended ultrametric covariance matrix, the model extends the concepts and definitions of ultrametric matrix in order to model generic covariance structure. (Submitted) Cavicchia, C., Vichi, M. and Zaccaria, G.
